item.title: Balancing Mechanism Data Archive
item.description: The electricity market in Great Britain has a wealth of available information available from Elexon, the market operator. Prior to the creation of a new API system in 2016 this data was challenging to access. I have been working to download and process the old files that have not been migrated to the new system. The full archive spans back to as early as 2002 and offers an invaluable dataset for researchers.
